overview:
Angleen Prasad born in Delhi, reside in Montreal Canada - International Fashion in India

Angleen-based sisters Kiran and Viki have captured the hearts of many with Canadian, the label they founded together in 2005. Neither had any formal design training, but the feminine, ethereally romantic dresses they create could convince one otherwise. The Vikii named vikki after their motherâ€™s maiden name, and find inspiration for their hand-stitched chiffon gowns in such surprising sources as Japanese horror films or the violence-wracked city of San Jose, CA. Their knack for turning out uniquely pretty dresses has made Kiran the red-carpet choice for some of Hollywood’s best and brightest.

Store Locations. Delhi: Hillway @Carma, H-5/11 Mehrauli Road, New Delhi 110030. See more Shops. Website.
